headline: The Best Dividend Paying Utility Stocks to Invest $2,000 in Right Now
summary: Three of the best utility stock options today are Black Hills (NYSE: BKH), NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE), and Dominion Energy (NYSE: D), but each one is attractive for a very (very!) different reason.  The Dividend King list is a highly elite group of companies that have increased their dividends annually for at least 50 consecutive years.
